name: Ghost Hotel
description:
Congratulations on your purchase of the legendary Ghost Hotel!

But, now comes the fun part. Use up to four different colors to shrink and grow swarms of ghost trying to wake your sleeping patrons. It is simple, the more incident free nights you watch over, the more money you'll make to pay back the bank.

Use upgrade to make your lantern brighter and stronger, because the higher you go in Ghost Hotel, the more annoying those ghosts get!

Ghost Hotel is an addictive coffee-break arcade game that features truly unique gameplay and a gorgeous tongue-in-cheek visual style. Be amazed at the Art Deco inspired architecture of Ghost Hotel, but don't look too long, because from the get go the ghosts will be coming! Easy to pick up, but hard to master, Ghost Hotel provides a challenge for players of all ages.

***Highlights***

- Full Retina support
- Tons of Upgrades!
- 40 Floors of Gameplay!
- Intuitive and easy to learn
- Frantic gameplay that tests your multi-tasking and prioritization skills
- Beautiful unique visuals and catchy original music
- Kid friendly, mother approved
